testimonials.quote: Absolutely buzzing with my new tattoo! The team really understood what I wanted and the vegan inks were a massive plus for me. Studio's spotless too.
testimonials.author: Emma K.

testimonials.quote: Been getting tattooed for years and this is hands down the best experience I've had. Really happy with the fine line work, so clean.
testimonials.author: Jake M.

paragraphs: We opened Buzz Club because we wanted to prove that ethical tattooing doesn't mean compromising on quality. Every ink we use is 100% vegan, every design is completely custom, and every client leaves with something they'll treasure forever. Our Wellington Street studio has become a hub for Leeds' most discerning tattoo collectors.

Our team specialises in everything from delicate fine line work to bold traditional pieces and photorealistic portraits. We're not just tattoo artists – we're collaborators who work closely with each client to bring their vision to life. The 979+ five-star reviews speak to our commitment to excellence in every aspect of the experience.
about.callout: Every piece of ink at Buzz Club is vegan-certified and cruelty-free
about.imageAlt: Buzz Club tattoo artist at work in the Wellington Street studio

items.question: Do you really only use vegan inks?
items.answer: Absolutely – every single ink we use is 100% vegan and cruelty-free. We're committed to ethical tattooing without compromising on colour vibrancy or longevity. All our inks are fully certified and we're happy to show you the documentation.

items.question: How far in advance do I need to book?
items.answer: It depends on what you're after. Consultations we can usually fit in within a week, small custom pieces are typically 2-3 weeks out, and larger complex work might be 4-6 weeks. We always try to accommodate urgent requests where possible though.

items.question: Can you work from my own design?
items.answer: We love working with client ideas! Bring in whatever reference you have – sketches, photos, Pinterest boards, whatever. We'll work with you to refine it and make sure it'll translate beautifully as a tattoo. That's what the consultation session is perfect for.

finalCta.headline: Ready for Your Next Tattoo?
finalCta.subheadline: Join the hundreds of satisfied clients who've chosen ethical, custom ink at Buzz Club

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to discuss availability and pricing.
booking.successMessage: We'll review your request and get back to you within 24 hours with availability and next steps.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your booking
